extendedInfo.description: Duplicate/Similar Image Finder can detect all duplicate images (photos or pictures) located on your Android device. Application scans selected folders & sub folders, and detects not only exact duplicates, but also those images which are visually similar (based on configurable visual similarity setting - similarity percentage). Main purpose of Duplicate/Similar Image Finder is to find all duplicate and similar images and help you organize your image collections without manually browsing through thousands of photos visually comparing all your photos. This way you can save valuable disk space as well as precious time. App is provided free of charge, with optional advertising removal charge.Duplicate/Similar Image Finder scans quickly through thousands of images which are then grouped/organized, in order for you to remove those duplicate/similar photos taking space on your mobile phone or tablet. In order to be efficient, we're using very advanced algorithms to find these duplicate images. We mimic and replicates exactly what a human would do in order to find images which are comparable in a visual way. Duplicate/Similar Image Finder can identify such duplicate images even if they are in different image formats and sizes. In order to allow higher degree of configuration, Duplicate/Similar Image Finder allows you to specify a percentage of image similarity that will be used during the scan. Higher the percentage, less similar (duplicate) photos will be found. As we've mentioned earlier, once the scan process is finished, our app will display all duplicate images categorized into groups and then let you to select duplicate images for either preview or deletion.In such simple way you can clean up your collection of photos or images from all duplicate files. We support most popular image formats and provide very intuitive user interface which lets you navigate the screens without a need for reference to a lengthy documentation/manual. Due to its innovative and optimized algorithms we're currently the fastest and the most precise product of this type on the Android market. Features: - Find all similar and duplicate images in user specified folders using visual comparison feature- Scan entire device for similar and/or duplicate images- Find exact duplicate image files using fast algorithm (select 100% similarity)- Finds all possible duplicate images- Get information about each image (date time taken, size, etc.)- Find duplicates in different color schemes (grayscaled, various hues, etc.)- User can adjust the percent of image similarity- Show preview for original and duplicate images- Duplicate images can be deleted permanently- Supports many image file formats- Very intuitive interface--Requirements: OpenCV library. Our software will automatically prompt you to download OpenCV library upon first opening of the app.Note: Processing huge amount of images may take time and is depended on your Android hardware.Please consider supporting this free app by purchasing Advertising Removal through in-app build process.--Organize images and save valuable disk space!

reviews.title: Such Narrow mindedness belongs in the apple app store not here
reviews.comment: Lets itself down by not being able to access external USB devices. Until this feature is added it is completely useless

reviews.title: Nicely done!
reviews.comment: I have tried  and it helped me to clear lot of duplicate photos in my sdcard. Searching them menually is really pain. This app is great to search for visually similar image. Great work!
reviews.author: mitesh patel

reviews.title: RE:Question
reviews.comment: After search for duplicates has completed, are all the items shown duplicates? Or do I delete all but one? Basically what I\'m asking is that can all items shown in the window where you delete duplicates be deleted or do I delete all but one? I\'m afraid if I delete all items that I will in fact be deleting all including the original. Seems that when I tested, I deleted all items shown and that deleted all including the original. Will raise back to 5 stars when replied.
reviews.author: steven johnson

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: It take time to scan, but it is worth the time and wait.

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: Would just like to swipe between similar pics quickly for compsrison, maybe even show 2 on the one screen.
reviews.author: Ian Fifer

reviews.title: Too bad no nas
reviews.comment: Well, this is useless to me since I do not house my pics on my tab but on server and this thing does not even allow me too choose a specific folder locally, never mind a network drive. Considering networks are ubiquitous and android hardware is a ntworked computer, I am puzzled as to how many apps make themselves useless for networks; pity.
reviews.author: Al Pine

reviews.title: Too slow
reviews.comment: It uses a naive quadratic algorithm that compares all pairs of pictures. Classifying pictures in a rough way would speed up a lot.
reviews.author: Michael Hemmer

reviews.title: Perfection. Purchased.
reviews.comment: Does exactly what is says. This type of image verification takes a lot of time, that\'s just how it is. This app was the last app that I needed 3 years ago when I went completely tablet and threw away all my PCs. Currently DUP checking over 300,000 photos, a little at a time. Need a way to auto select biggest, smallest, oldest, newest etc leaving only one duplicated image, and possibly a way to move dups to a folder. To delevoper, check out Visipics options.
reviews.author: Glen H

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: It install and find lots of duplicate images on my phone and memory card.. i increased my phonememory. Thankss a lot.

reviews.title: Very pleased

reviews.title: Way too slow to be useful
reviews.comment: Never got to see what the software actually did or looked like. On my s3 (no CPU slouch), scanning a folder of 140 photos stretched into 5+ minutes and I uninstalled. The software should probably use the thumbnails as the reference image to determine similarity. Obviously the current method is pointless.
